summary:
I set goals with my manager and achieve them by directly participating in all necessary sales campaigns, customers and any bids or proposals, if necessary, to ensure success i.e.: takes on a 'player / manager' role when and where necessary to ensure the success of major campaigns. I really enjoy working in a team together with delivery.

I actively and personally (like to) develop senior customer relationships that support the overall realization of new sales targets and ensure continuity of representation. Experience and proficiency in building senior executive relationships and board level credibility. Excellent understanding and extensive knowledge of the strategic issues facing major clients and the IT industry in general, coupled with a major client's personal credibility at the IT Director / C - level. Ability to add value in multiple dimensions. I have a strong network in Mid-Market as well in the Large Enterprise Market across all verticals. 

Further strengths (which came out this assessment) include: • Results-driven, logical and methodical approach to achieving tasks and objectives • Identifies and develops opportunities; innovates and making things happen • Excellent interpersonal skills - good communicator, leadership, high integrity • Seeks and finds solutions to challenges - exceptionally positive attitude • Reliable and dependable in meeting objectives - hard-working • Seeks new responsibilities and uses initiative; self-sufficient

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

profile_positions.description:
ServiceNow is changing the way people work. By placing a service-oriented lens on the activities, tasks and processes that make up day-to-day work life, we help the modern enterprise operate faster, better and more scalable than ever before. As the enterprise cloud company, ServiceNow provides a service model that defines, structures and automates the flow of work, removing email and spreadsheets from the process to streamline the delivery of services.

I am part of the Majors team that includes the large and strategic customers for the Dutch market. I maintain direct relationships with C-Level contacts at our strategic clients and work closely with partners, advisory firms and large system integrators. In my current role I am ultimately responsible for these customers and have a (advice and technical) team that reports to me.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Sales Executive

profile_positions.description: RSA delivers globally a unified, business-driven approach to managing digital risk uniting stakeholders, integrating technologies and transforming risk into reward. RSA’s Risk and Cybersecurity solutions help organisations to reduce the risks of operating in a digital world. Through visibility, detection, analysis and response RSA solutions, research and strategic advisory give customers the ability to detect, investigate and respond to advanced threats.
profile_positions.title: Senior sales executive

profile_positions.description:
Paul is responsible for various markets and large accounts in The Netherlands. Furthermore he is responsible for Belgium, one of SIG's fastest growing countries. From 2014, SIG has added Germany and Luxembourg to his responsibilities. In Belgium, Paul has acquired many large (new) clients such as KBC, BNP Paribas, ING Belgium, Credit Agricole, Crelan, Belfius, Argenta and BPOST Bank. In telecom Vodafone, Ziggo, Proximus, Telenet, Base, KPN, T-Mobile etc. For Vodafone I was responsible globally for this account and managed this account through VPC (Luxembourg) and HQ in the UK. 

SIG is a fast-growing management consultancy that advises clients on Software Quality, Software Risk and Software Economics. We provide management with a fact-based insight into their current IT situation, along with pragmatic and actionable recommendations on how to improve that situation. We know how to govern software projects effectively, when and how to invest in quality improvement, how to rationalize and how to control cost. We perform both in-depth technical analysis and management level financial analysis and consolidate the two. Our research department advances the state of the art in software research.

Our clients are located throughout Europe, and use our services to manage their systems, whether they are old, new, developed in house, or off-shored to a different continent. We have an in-house ISO 17025 certified laboratory to perform software analyses. Together with TÜV we certify the quality of software systems. We are changing the enterprise software industry by making sure Quality and Risk are part of the procurement process.

In 2019, Paul received an award for achieving the highest intake and revenue for 2018.
profile_positions.title: Principal Sales Executive

profile_positions.description: Kaseya is a leading provider of IT automation software for IT service providers and public and private sector IT organizations. The Kaseya managed service platform is designed for IT administrators who need to reduce complexity, and increase productivity and managed service providers that want to pass those benefits to their customers and increase their own profit margins.
profile_positions.title: Sales Manager Benelux

profile_positions.description:
Logica is a leading IT and business services company, employing 40,000 people across 36 countries. We provide business consulting, systems integration, and IT and business process outsourcing services. 

Logica works closely with its customers to release their potential - enabling change that increases their efficiency, accelerates growth and manages risk. We apply our deep industry knowledge, technical excellence and global delivery expertise to help our customers build leadership positions in their markets.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Director

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for growing LogMeIn's business in the EMEA region.
- Leading opportunities
- Positioning LogMeIn 
- Building indirect channel relationships
- Expanding LogMeIn's presence to new markets LogMeIn is a leading provider of on-demand helpdesk support solutions, remote-connectivity solutions to Telcos, IT Service providers, SMBs & Consumers. 

Businesses and IT Service providers use LogMeIn's solutions to deliver remote end-user support and to access and manage Computers, Smart phones and other Internet-enabled devices more effectively and more efficiently. Consumers and mobile workers use our solutions to access computer resources remotely, thereby facilitating their mobility and increasing their productivity.
profile_positions.title: Business Development Director EMEA

profile_positions.description:
Fujitsu is a leading provider of customer-focused IT and communications solutions for the global marketplace. Pace-setting device technologies, highly reliable computing and communications products, and a worldwide corps of systems and services experts uniquely position Fujitsu to deliver comprehensive solutions that open up infinite possibilities for its customers success.
Headquartered in Tokyo, Fujitsu Limited (TSE:6702) reported consolidated revenues of 4.8 trillion yen (€35.3 billion) for the fiscal year ended March 31, 2004.
My job contains the creation of new business (sales) strategic campaigns or make new customers strategic for Fujitsu focused on outsourcing or new technology solutions.

Won in 2007 the biggest deal (so far) for Fujitsu NL named Reggefiber (FttH). Won this big case from the competition Alcatel Lucent, Packetfront, Motorola and Erricsson. In 2005 won the DSLAM infrastructure solution for Tiscali. Competition was Alcatel.
profile_positions.title: Account Director Strategic Campaigns

profile_positions.description: My job contains the creation of new business (sales) strategic campaigns or make new customers strategic for Fujitsu focused on outsourcing or new technology solutions.
profile_positions.title: New Business Sales

profile_positions.description:
ICL PLC is an information technology company specialising in systems integration in selected markets , supported by its service and technology businesses. Operating in over 80 countries world¬wide, with 24,000 employees, ICL generated revenues of £2.6 billion in 1993.
The prime focus of our business is systems integration in selected markets.  This is supported by our service and technology businesses.
profile_positions.title: Accountmanager

profile_positions.description:
ABN AMRO is an all-round bank servicing retail, private and commercial banking clients. With a strong foundation in the Netherlands, we support clients based in the Netherlands and abroad with our know-how of banking and specialist sector knowledge and a selective international network.

ABN AMRO is also internationally active in a number of specialist activities such as Energy, Commodities & Transportation, Clearing and collateralised Finance (factoring and lease in Western Europe). Our private banking business is market leader in the Netherlands and serves clients in 13 countries and territories.
profile_positions.title: Credit Assistant / Accountmanager
